column2: geom_point(aes(fill = factor(has_emoji), size = counts_details), pch = 21, alpha = 0.5) +
scale_fill_manual(values = c("#29066b", "#ea7369"), name = "Has Emoji", labels = c("No Emoji", "Contains Emoji")) +
labs(x = "Profile Visits Count", y = "Number of Kisses", size = "Details Count", fill = "Contains Emoji") +
scale_colour_manual(values = c("#29066b", "#ea7369"), name = "Has Emoji", labels = c("No Emoji", "Contains Emoji"))
